verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of Nehemiah <S%H5166><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hacaliah <S%H2446><s%>. Now it came to pass in the month <S%H2320><s%> Chislev <S%H3691><s%>, in the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, as I was in Shushan <S%H7800><s%> the palace <S%H1002><s%>,

that Hanani <S%H2607><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> of my brethren <S%H251><s%>, came <S%H935><s%>, he and certain men <S%H582><s%> out of Judah <S%H3063><s%>; and I asked <S%H7592><s%> them concerning the Jews <S%H3064><s%> that had escaped <S%H6413><s%>, that were left <S%H7604><s%> of the captivity <S%H7628><s%>, and concerning Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H7604><s%>, The remnant that are left <S%H7604><s%> of the captivity <S%H7628><s%> there in the province <S%H4082><s%> are in great <S%H1419><s%> affliction <S%H7451><s%> and reproach <S%H2781><s%>: the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> also is broken down <S%H6555><s%>, and the gates <S%H8179><s%> thereof are burned <S%H3341><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H8085><s%>, when I heard these words <S%H1697><s%>, that I sat down <S%H3427><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%>, and mourned <S%H56><s%> certain days <S%H3117><s%>; and I fasted <S%H6684><s%> and prayed <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>,

and said <S%H559><s%>, I beseech <S%H577><s%> thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, the great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, that keepeth <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> with them that love <S%H157><s%> him and keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%>:

Let thine ear <S%H241><s%> now be attentive <S%H7183><s%>, and thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> open <S%H6605><s%>, that thou mayest hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, which I pray <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee at this time <S%H3117><s%>, day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%>, for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%> while I confess <S%H3034><s%> the sins <S%H2403><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which we have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee <S%H1><s%>. Yea, I and my father's house <S%H1004><s%> have sinned <S%H2398><s%>:

we have dealt very <S%H2254><s%> corruptly <S%H2254><s%> against thee <S%H8104><s%>, and have not kept the commandments <S%H4687><s%>, nor the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, nor the ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, which thou commandedst <S%H6680><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%>, I beseech thee <S%H1697><s%>, the word that thou commandedst <S%H6680><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, If ye trespass <S%H4603><s%>, I will scatter you abroad <S%H6327><s%> among the peoples <S%H5971><s%>:

but if ye return <S%H7725><s%> unto me <S%H8104><s%>, and keep my commandments <S%H4687><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H5080><s%>, though your outcasts were in the uttermost part <S%H7097><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, yet will I gather <S%H6908><s%> them from thence <S%H935><s%>, and will bring them unto the place <S%H4725><s%> that I have chosen <S%H977><s%>, to cause my name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell there <S%H7931><s%>.

Now these are thy servants <S%H5650><s%> and thy people <S%H5971><s%>, whom thou hast redeemed <S%H6299><s%> by thy great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%>, and by thy strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.

O Lord <S%H136><s%>, I beseech <S%H577><s%> thee <S%H241><s%>, let now thine ear be attentive <S%H7183><s%> to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, and to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, who delight <S%H2655><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>; and prosper <S%H6743><s%>, I pray thee <S%H5650><s%>, thy servant this day <S%H3117><s%>, and grant <S%H5414><s%> him mercy <S%H7356><s%> in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of this man <S%H376><s%>. Now I was cupbearer <S%H8248><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%>.
